itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Cook's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Cooks.

item.name: Light Iron Horseshoe
item.desc: Sturdier and lighter horseshoe made of high-quality iron\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Parrying Dagger
item.desc: A dagger made for parrying attacks.

item.name: Parrying Dagger of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Parrying Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Parrying Dagger of Crimson Flame, Parrying Dagger

item.name: Ultimate Parrying Dagger
item.desc: A Parrying Dagger developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Parrying Dagger of Crimson Flame, Parrying Dagger of Destruction, Parrying Dagger of Temptation, Parrying Dagger

item.name: Parrying Dagger of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Parrying Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Parrying Dagger of Temptation, Parrying Dagger

item.name: Parrying Dagger of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Parrying Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Parrying Dagger of Destruction, Parrying Dagger

item.name: Ultimate Blade Trinket
item.desc: A Blade Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame, Blade Trinket of Destruction, Blade Trinket of Temptation, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Temptation, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Destruction, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket
item.desc: A trinket with an ornamental knife attached.

item.name: Kite Shield
item.desc: A high-strength alloy shield that provides maximum defense.

item.name: Kite Shield of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Kite Shield.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Kite Shield of Crimson Flame, Kite Shield

item.name: Ultimate Kite Shield
item.desc: A Kite Shield developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Kite Shield of Crimson Flame, Kite Shield of Destruction, Kite Shield of Temptation, Kite Shield

item.name: Kite Shield of Temptation

item.name: Rhik Talisman
item.desc: A talisman with enhanced defensive abilities.

item.name: Theos Ornamental Knot
item.desc: A handmade ornamental knot for an axe lined with gold.
